metadata.title: CVE-2019-15043 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Grafana 2.x through 6.x before 6.3.4, parts of the HTTP API allowunauthenticated use. This makes it possible to run a denial of serviceattack against the server running Grafana.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
